name: Hidden Object: Queen Mystic Story Ghost Gold Version Free
name_original: Hidden Object: Queen Mystic Story Ghost Gold Version Free
description:
Once upon a time, long-long time ago, in a kingdom a great misfortune happened - the queen got lost, and over time she wasn’t found. Later there were rumors that there appeared her spirit, roaming the earth and looking for magic items that will help her to find the strength of dark magic.If so, innocent people could be hurt, because nothing will stop her in her search. It is necessary to stop her as soon as possible and force to leave our world. Only an experienced connoisseur of
ancient spells is able to do it. That is you who can stop it. Do not waste your time and start to act!

FEATURES:
1. 48 Amazing levels that will challenge your vision and perception every step of the way.
2. Stunning graphics
3. Hundreds of hidden objects with various difficulties.
4. Exciting mini games that will test your mettle and brain.
5. Hints to get you out of tight spots when you fail to find objects on time.
6. Mysterious story line while you search objects to make the game more exciting.
